item.title: China's car exports surged in 2025, but domestic demand slowed
item.description: China has reported its auto exports rose 21% last year from the year before, driven by a surge in electric vehicle shipments

item.title: Hong Kong wants to expand oversight of building maintenance after deadly fire
item.description: Hong Kong officials want to expand oversight of building maintenance and enhancing fire safety measures

item.title: Luxury retailer Saks Global files for bankruptcy as it prepares to restructure
item.description: Luxury retailer Saks Global has filed for bankruptcy, preparing to reposition itself after obtaining about $1.75 billion in financing commitments

item.title: China's trade surplus surges 20% to a record $1.2 trillion, even with Trump's tariffs
item.description: China has reported its trade surplus surged to a record of almost $1.2 trillion last year as exports to other countries made up for slowing shipments ...

item.title: Proposed billionaires' tax in California rattles Silicon Valley
item.description: A proposal to tax the accumulated wealth of California billionaires has ignited a political uproar in Silicon Valley and across the state
